userstatus-ago:
Phrase for indicating how long ago something happened.
{{Identical|Ago}}
userstatus-time-days:
Phrase for indicating how long ago something happened.
{{Identical|Day}}
userstatus-time-hours:
Phrase for indicating how long ago something happened.
{{Identical|Hour}}
userstatus-time-minutes:
Phrase for indicating how long ago something happened.
{{Identical|Minute}}
userstatus-time-seconds:
Phrase for indicating how long ago something happened.
{{Identical|Second}}
userstatus-no-updates: A hint about a empty result
userstatus-woops:
Page title for when an error of some kind has occurred
{{Identical|Oops}}
userstatus-delete-thought-text:
{{notranslate}}
Link text for a link that allows you to delete a status update
userstatus-nobody-agrees: A hint about a empty result
userstatus-no-new-thoughts: A hint about a empty result
userstatus-just-added: Phrase for indicating how long ago something happened.
userstatus-confirm-delete: Confirmation message used in JavaScript as well as on Special:UserStatus for users who have JavaScript disabled shown prior to deleting a status update
userstatus-delete-page-title: Page title for Special:UserStatus when deleting a thought for users who have JavaScript disabled
userstatus-delete-success: Success message shown on Special:UserStatus for users who have JavaScript disabled after they've deleted a status update
userstatus-confirm-vote: Confirmation message used in JavaScript as well as on Special:UserStatus for users who have JavaScript disabled prior to agreeing with a status update
userstatus-vote: Button text, shown on the same confirmation screen as {{msg-mw|userstatus-confirm-vote}}
userstatus-vote-page-title: Page title for Special:UserStatus when voting for a thought for users who have JavaScript disabled
userstatus-vote-success: Success message shown for users who don't have JavaScript enabled after they've agreed with a status update ("thought").
apihelp-userstatus-param-vote:
{{doc-important|1. Please do not translate both numbers (1 and -1); 2. Please ignore the auto-provided "Do not translate text that either quoted" below, translating both "upvote" and "downvote" are OK here.}}
{{doc-apihelp-param|userstatus|vote}}
